items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t doubt that Mary will come to the party.
Tom doesn\'t have any friends who like to play golf.
Tom doesn\'t have enough money to buy a new trumpet.
Tom says he\'s thinking about buying a new computer.
Interestingly enough, that\'s exactly what happened.
We should tell Tom that he needs to be more careful.
Just as Tom was about to speak, the lights went out.
Tom never had any intention of letting Mary do that.
Tom criticized Mary for not doing the job correctly.
Tom currently manages a hotel not too far from here.
